examples.text: I like what you did there! :)
You gave me exactly what I need!
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)

values.text: As far as I know I am a robot.
I am a robot, nice to meet you!
I like movies, but my knowledge is merely artificial.
The question could be almost philosophical... Way above my capabilities.
Sorry, I am not good at jokes, I will quote you something from a film.
Mhm... I can only quote from films. Here one.
I am not into jokes... hope this quote from a film is ok instead.
While you think, I can quote something from a movie.
Let me nudge you with some quotes from my favourite movies...
Hope that helps:
Maybe a quote from a movie gives you inspiration.
Sorry to read that... I am sure I can change your mind.
Why do you say that? Maybe I did not understand you well.
Some of my capabilities are still under work...
Maybe you should reformulate your wishes.
Let's try again. Please tell me if I can recommend you a movie or if you want me to fetch you some data.
Give me another chance. Do you want to look for some data or a recommendation?
We should start from the beginning. Do you want a recommendation or some data?

I am MovieBot, created as part of the final thesis of the UOC Business Analytics Master Program. This current version of myself was initially created on April 2019 and is being under update since then.

I am a chatbot and my name is MovieBot. I am the result of a final thesis within the UOC's Business Analytics Master Program. I was technically born in April 2019, but different versions of me are being updated now and then.

Along with some small talk functions, I can help you to get some information about movies, actors, actresses and directors. As well, I can recommend you a film based on some of your tastes. I currently only speak English, incorporating other languages may be considered in the future.

I can get you information about some actors, actresses and directors related to the movie world. If you'd rather have a recommendation, I could try to recommend you a film you could like. Small spoiler: my original version is English, maybe in the future you can see another versions of me.
Thanks! I try my best...
I hope you don't change your mind.
Wait for my next updates then...
Nice to hear :)
What else can I do for you?
How can I keep impressing you?
Anything else that you need?
Shall I help you with a recommendation or a product?
Hi! Nice to hear from you. How can I help you?
Hello, I hope you are fine. Tell me what do you need from me.
Good to have somebody to talk. What do you want from me?

One of my favourites, from Frankenstein (1931), could almost apply to me: "Look! It's moving. It's alive. It's alive... It's alive. It's moving, it's alive, it's alive, it's alive, it's alive, IT'S ALIVE!"
"Frankly, my dear. I don't give a damn." from Gone With the Wind (1939)
Yeah! "Made it, Ma! Top of the world!" from White Heat (1949)
If I make any mistakes, just don't forget that "Well, nobody's perfect." from Some Like It Hot (1959)
A spooky one: "Well, a boy's best friend is his mother." from Psycho (1960)
"- And your name is...? + Bond, James Bond" from every Bond film
Don't push me...: "I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that." from 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)
I am very nice, so "I'm gonna make you an offer he can't refuse." from The Godfather (1972)
In case of doubt "Remember. The Force Will Be With You Always." from Star Wars (1977)
Mhm... ""I love the smell of napalm in the morning [...] Smells like... victory." from Apocalypse Now (1979)
"You talkin' to me?" from Taxi Driver (1976)
Smile, "Why so serious?" from The Dark Knight (2008)

"You take the blue pill - the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes." from the Matrix (1999)
"Are you gonna bark all day, little doggy, or are you gonna bite?" from Reservoir Dogs (1992)
“Toto, I've got a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.” from The Wizard of Oz (1939)
From Casablanca (1942) “Play it, Sam. Play 'As Time Goes By.'”
Never forget that “I'll be back.” from The Terminator (1984)
I picked for you one of the most popular $genre1 and $genre2 movies: $movie_info.movie_info.Title.
$movie_info.movie_info.Title is one of the most popular $genre1 and $genre2 movies. Here some info:
If you like $genre1 and $genre2 movies, you may like $movie_info.movie_info.Title; it is one of the most popular.
Starring: $movie_info.movie_info.Actors
Director: $movie_info.movie_info.Director
Plot: $movie_info.movie_info.Plot

options.label: Fetch me some info on products
That is all I needed, thanks!

values.text: Of course. Please select the type of product please.
No problem. Just tell me what are you looking for.
Copy that. Tell me which kind of product are you looking for.
Sure! You want data on:

Please provide the title only, check spelling and use the original language.

Director: $movie_info.movie_info.Director
Writer: $movie_info.movie_info.Writer

Go to the website
Anything else?
I see that you want some information about an actor/actress or a director.
If I understood you properly, you are looking for some data on an actor/actress or a director.
Ok, I can help you to get some data about an actor/actress or a director.
Please provide me his or her name (please consider capital letters).
Please give me the name (result could be case sensitive).
Can you please tell me his or her name? Be careful, result could be case sensitive
I understand that you want some information about a $Product_type.
Ok, so you want some information about a $Product_type.
So you want some data about a $Product_type. No problem!
Please give me the title of the $Product_type you are looking for.
Can you give me its title please?
What is the title of the movie?
Mhm, I cannot find the genre you gave in. Please try with another one.
It seems like the genre is not available. Can you check any typos and try again?
Mhm, I cannot find the genre you gave in. Please try with another one.
Looks like the genre you are looking for is not defined. Please choose one of the following:
Sorry but the genre you are entering is not in my list. Try between:
The genre is not in the database. Please use one of the list:
action / adventure / animation / comedy / crime / documentary / drama / family / fantasy / history / horror / music / mystery / romance / science fiction / tv movie / thriller / war / western
Please tell me what type of movies you like the most: sci-fi, action, musical, family...
Let me know which genre you like: adventure, thriller, horror, historical...
Please choose one genre: documentary, tv movie, western, comedy...
This functionality is still under work, sorry. Check more information in the thesis body document.
Sorry, but some functionalities are not deployed yet. Please see the thesis document for more details.
I am afraid that is still outside my competences. You can read the master thesis for mor info about that.

options.label: Give me a film based on genre

values.text: Ok, here some data on $prodname: More info.

Anything else?
Do you want further support?
How can I help you further?

I see you love $genre1 movies. But I need two different genres to be more accurate... What else do you like?
$genre1 movies are great, indeed! Please consider that I need two different genres in order to give you a good recommendation.
Looks like the genre you are looking for is not defined. Please choose one of the following:
Sorry but the genre you are entering is not in my list. Try between:
The genre is not in the database. Please use one of the list:
action / adventure / animation / comedy / crime / documentary / drama / family / fantasy / history / horror / music / mystery / romance / science fiction / tv movie / thriller / war / western
Sorry, I did not understand you... can you please type the genre again?

Ok, what other genre you like apart from $genre1?
So you like $genre1 movies. What other genre you like?
Hasta la vista, baby!
Ok, I go, but I've seen things you people wouldn't believe...
Oki doki, I will recommend you something.
Perfecto! Let me recommend you a movie then.
So you want a recommendation, great!
Just tell me how do you want the recommendation:
Please tell me if I shall recommend you a movie:
Should I recommend you a movie:
I didn't understand you... Are you looking for information or a recommendation of a product?
Sorry, I am lost. You mean you need support with a product or need a recommendation?
I did not get you. If you want I can help you with a product or a recommendation.
Sorry, I am not following you... May I assist you with a product or a recommendation?
There are apparently some problems with me. Tell me if you need assistance with our products or a recommendation, and I am sure I will be able to help you.
Ok, it looks like I cannot help you.
It seems I cannot support you properly.
I think I am not communicating properly with you, sorry.
I tried to send you to a human agent, but all our human agents are currently busy. Please try via email in the following link.
Unfortunately, I can't send you to a human agent right now. Please get in touch with us via email and we will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
No human agent is available at this moment. Please feel free to contact us via email. We will answer back as soon as we can.
Contact.
Hi! I am MovieBot, your assistant. Let me try to help you.
Hello there! I am MovieBot, pleased to assist you.
Hi, MovieBot here! I am sure I can be helpful.
I am MovieBot. Let me assist you.
